item.title: Field Trip Instructions
item.description: (This page may change.) We will go on a field trip nearly every Friday morning at 8. Usually we will ride in the van to one or two destinations less than 30 minutes away. We will normally return by 11 AM. Preparations in advance We will need your signed/filled-in permission form before you can go on any trips off campus. Seriously, plan to be able to dress for dangerous weather.
